name: Olvido
description:
Olvido is a concept based on "La cosecha de los Violentos" a painting created by Alfonso Quijano, wich reflects the reality of a Colombian period of time literally named "The Violence" an armed conflict which lasted between 1925 and 1958.
This videogames intends to transmit the importance of historical memory, and it´s relevance for understanstt our past, our culture and our identity as colombians.
